faqSection.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqSection.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about AllVer.

questions.question: What is AllVer?
questions.answer: AllVer is a platform that simplifies shopping by helping you find stores and exclusive offers in local shopping centers.

questions.question: How can I search for a store?
questions.answer: You can use our interactive map or search by category and popularity to easily locate the store you're looking for.

questions.question: Is AllVer free to use?
questions.answer: Yes, AllVer is completely free for buyers. Sellers may have additional options for premium listings.

questions.question: Can I earn money through AllVer?
questions.answer: Yes, you can earn money through the AllVer platform by inviting your friends and traders. The more people you bring, the more you earn.

questions.question: How do I support local traders through AllVer?
questions.answer: By shopping with local stores listed on AllVer, you directly support the local economy and community.

questions.question: How can I add the AllVer app?
questions.answer: You can download the app from the Apple App Store and Google Play Store.

questions.question: Are there any exclusive proposals?
questions.answer: Yes, there are many exclusive offers on the app, such as opportunities to promote yourself as a trader, earn rewards, and discover more unique features designed to help you grow.

contactUsSection.title: Have a question? You can ask us.
contactUsSection.subtitle: If you have any questions, get in touch with us.

about_us.label: About us
about_us.heading: YOLLDA IS YOUR PARTNER ON EVERY JOURNEY.
about_us.description: We're empowering drivers and communities with on-demand towing, tire repairs, battery boosts, and fuel delivery—making streets safer, smoother, and more people-friendly.

earn_with_section.heading: Earn with Yollda
earn_with_section.description: Join thousands of partners who earn by keeping drivers on the move—tow‑truck operators (car & freight), tire techs, battery specialists, fuel couriers, and fleet owners.

description.top: You tap, help comes. Can’t tap? We’ve got you.
description.middle: If your phone detects a crash and there’s no response, Yollda sends a help request on your behalf — instantly.
description.bottom: Had a breakdown or accident? Tap for help and nearby Yollda users will be alerted immediately

how_partner_section.heading: How Yollda Partner Works
how_partner_section.description: Download Yollda Partner app for Appstore or Playstore, create account use your car and driver by yourself. Get ride and earn more money

step1.title: Go online
step1.description: Open the app and go online to start receiving service requests in your area.

step2.title: Accept a request
step2.description: Review incoming service details and tap to accept when you're ready.

step3.title: Provide Assistance
step3.description: Drive to the customer and provide the selected roadside assistance.

step4.title: Earn and track income
step4.description: Get paid quickly and monitor your earnings through the app dashboard.

revenue_section.heading: MAKE EVERY ROAD
revenue_section.description: Join a growing network of service pros who keep drivers safe and moving. Earn on your schedule by providing essential roadside help where it matters most.

benefit1.title: Earn when you want dfsf sdf sdf dsfs sdfdsf
benefit1.description: Support drivers during breakdowns, flat tires, and fuel needs. Work weekends or evenings — it's your call.

benefit2.title: Weekly payouts
benefit2.description: We pay you every week. No upfront fees, no subscriptions — just a fair commission on each completed job.

benefit3.title: A steady flow of service requests
benefit3.description: Earn consistently by helping drivers with Yollda's steady flow of assistance service requests.

partner_section.heading: Get started as
partner_section.description: Whether you're an individual specialist or manage a fleet, Yollda lets you earn by providing essential roadside assistance — on your own time. Support drivers when they need it most.

benefit1.title: Fill in the application
benefit1.description: Choose your city, share your contact details and service type. We’ll guide you through the next steps.

benefit2.title: Upload your documents
benefit2.description: Submit required documents like your ID, driver’s license, and service-related permits.

benefit3.title: Get approved and start
benefit3.description: Once your documents are verified, you’ll get access to the app and can start accepting service requests.

faq_section.newsletter_description: Subscribe to our newsletter and be the first to receive insights, updates, and expert tips on optimizing your financial management.
faq_section.thank_you_description: You'll receive our latest insights, updates, and expert tips on optimizing your financial management.

faq_items.question: How much does Bolt Drive cost? Do I need to pay for fuel?
faq_items.answer: Bolt Drive pricing varies by location and vehicle type. You typically pay a daily rate plus mileage. Fuel costs are usually included in the rental price, but this can vary by location. Check the app for specific pricing in your area.

faq_items.question: How do I unlock a Bolt Drive car?
faq_items.answer: To unlock a Bolt Drive car, simply open the Bolt app, locate your reserved vehicle on the map, and tap the 'Unlock' button when you're near the car. The doors will unlock automatically via the app's connectivity.

faq_items.question: Where do I find the car keys?
faq_items.answer: Bolt Drive cars don't use traditional keys. The vehicle is unlocked and started through the Bolt app on your smartphone. Once unlocked, you can start the engine using the start button inside the vehicle.

faq_items.question: How do I pay for Yollda Drive?
faq_items.answer: Payment for Yollda Drive is processed automatically through the payment method linked to your account. You'll be charged based on your usage time and distance traveled. All payments are handled securely through the app.

faq_items.question: What kind of cars can I rent with Yollda Partner?
faq_items.answer: All of our cars come with automatic transmission at no extra cost. The specific make and model of hire car depends on availability. Our car types include: small, electric, medium-sized, and premium cars, as well as SUVs and vans. Check the app to see which cars are available to rent nearby.

faq_items.question: What are the age requirements for renting?
faq_items.answer: You must be at least 21 years old to rent a vehicle through Yollda. Some premium vehicles may require you to be 25 or older. A valid driver's license is required for all rentals.

faq_items.question: Can I extend my rental period?
faq_items.answer: Yes, you can extend your rental period through the app if the vehicle is available. Additional charges will apply based on the extended time and mileage.

faq_items.question: What happens if I have an accident?
faq_items.answer: In case of an accident, immediately contact emergency services if needed, then report the incident through the app. Our 24/7 support team will guide you through the process and arrange assistance.
